operations.description: Registers the subscription for the storage cache resource provider and enables creation of Azure HPC Cache resources
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/register/action

operations.description: Validates the subnets for Amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/checkAmlFSSubnets/action

operations.description: Calculate the number of ips needed
operations.displayName: Returns the subnet size required the Amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/getRequiredAmlFSSubnetsSize/action

operations.description: Azure HPC Cache resource provider
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/unregister/action

operations.description: Lists operations available for the Azure HPC Cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/operations/read

operations.description: Lists available usage models for NFS storage targets in this cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/usageModels/read

operations.description: Creates a new cache, or updates an existing one
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/write

operations.description: Gets the properties of a cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/read

operations.description: Deletes the cache instance
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/delete

operations.description: Upgrades OS software for the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/Upgrade/action

operations.description: Starts the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/Start/action

operations.description: Stops the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/Stop/action

operations.description: Creates support information (GSI) or debug information for a cache.
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/debugInfo/action

operations.description: Adds a priming job to the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/addPrimingJob/action

operations.description: Removes a primining job from the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/removePrimingJob/action

operations.description: Pauses a running priming job in the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/pausePrimingJob/action

operations.description: Resumes a paused priming job in the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/resumePrimingJob/action

operations.description: Flushes cached data to storage targets
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/Flush/action

operations.description: Lists existing cache instances in the resource group
operations.displayName: List caches for a resource group
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/ResourceGroup/caches/read

operations.description: Lists the cache's storage targets
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargetsLists/read

operations.description: Creates a new storage target in the cache, or updates an existing one
operations.displayName: Create or update a cache storage target
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/write

operations.description: Gets properties of a storage target in the cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/read

operations.description: Deletes a cache storage target
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/delete

operations.description: Updates the storage target IP address from a custom DNS server or from an Azure Storage private endpoint
operations.displayName: Refresh DNS in a cache's Storage Target
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/dnsRefersh/action

operations.description: Disables client access to a cache's storage target. But doesn't permanently remove the storage target from the cache.
operations.displayName: Stop the storage target from serving requests temporarily
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/suspend/action

operations.description: Puts a suspended storage target back into service
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/resume/action

operations.description: Marks all cached files from the cache's storage target as out of date. The next time a client requests these files, they will be fetched from the back-end storage system.
operations.displayName: Discard cached files from this storage target
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/invalidate/action

operations.description: Restores the Cache's storage target's settings to their default values
operations.displayName: Restore storage target settings to defaults
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/storageTargets/restoreDefaults/action

operations.description: Lists all valid SKUs for the cache
operations.displayName: List SKUs for Azure HPC Cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/skus/read

operations.description: Reads Cache Metric Definitions.
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/providers/Microsoft.Insights/metricDefinitions/read

operations.description: Gets the diagnostic setting for the Cache.
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/providers/Microsoft.Insights/diagnosticSettings/read

operations.description: Creates or updates the diagnostic setting for the Cache.
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/providers/Microsoft.Insights/diagnosticSettings/write

operations.description: Lists existing caches in the subscription
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/Subscription/caches/read

operations.description: Gets the status of an asynchronous operation for the Azure HPC cache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/locations/ascOperations/read

operations.description: Gets the log definitions for the StorageCache
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/caches/providers/Microsoft.Insights/logDefinitions/read

operations.description: Lists existing amlfilesystem instances in the resource group
operations.displayName: List amlFilesystems for a resource group
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/ResourceGroup/amlFilesystems/read

operations.description: Lists existing amlfilesystems in the subscription
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/Subscription/amlFilesystems/read

operations.description: Gets the properties of an amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/amlFilesystems/read

operations.description: Creates a new amlfilesystem, or updates an existing one
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/amlFilesystems/write

operations.description: Deletes the amlfilesystem instance
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/amlFilesystems/delete

operations.description: Archive the data in the amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/amlFilesystems/Archive/action

operations.description: Cancel archiving the amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/amlFilesystems/CancelArchive/action

operations.description: Lists the usage quota for cache or Amlfilesystem
operations.displayName: Get quota for Cache or Amlfilesystem
operations.name: Microsoft.StorageCache/usages/read
